channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- RoboHelp
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- RoboHelp

item.title: CVE-2023-22273|2023-11-17T12:52:28.324Z -- adobe -- robohelp
item.description: Adobe RoboHelp Server versions 11.4 and earlier are affected by an Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability that could lead to Remote Code Execution by an admin authenticated attacker. Exploitation of this issue does not require user interaction.

item.title: CVE-2023-22272|2023-11-17T12:52:30.657Z -- adobe -- robohelp
item.description: Adobe RoboHelp Server versions 11.4 and earlier are affected by an Improper Input Validation vulnerability that could lead to information disclosure by an unauthenticated attacker. Exploitation of this issue does not require user interaction.

item.title: CVE-2023-22268|2023-11-17T12:52:29.878Z -- adobe -- robohelp
item.description: Adobe RoboHelp Server versions 11.4 and earlier are affected by an Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability that could lead to information disclosure by an low-privileged authenticated attacker. Exploitation of this issue does not require user interaction.

item.title: CVE-2023-22275|2023-11-17T12:52:31.426Z -- adobe -- robohelp
item.description: Adobe RoboHelp Server versions 11.4 and earlier are affected by an Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability that could lead to information disclosure by an unauthenticated attacker. Exploitation of this issue does not require user interaction.

item.title: CVE-2023-22274|2023-11-17T12:52:29.111Z -- adobe -- robohelp
item.description: Adobe RoboHelp Server versions 11.4 and earlier are affected by an Improper Restriction of XML External Entity Reference ('XXE') vulnerability that could lead to information disclosure by an unauthenticated attacker. Exploitation of this issue does not require user interaction.
